Live Final is a preview of final standin: Live Final is a preview of final standings if the season ended right now. It uses the same 'Adjusted Pts' formula as at season close: Total Δ × √(your games / room average). This prevents very low-activity players from winning only due to a perfect small sample.

Our primary data processing and storage: Our primary data processing and storage facilities for Firestore and Cloud Functions are located in the europe-west1 (Belgium) region.
